legacy.full_text:
Eight years ago, 12-year-old Zhang Linyan said her dream was to join national team. ⚽️⚽️

On Feb. 6, China clinched #AFC Women's Asian Cup title and Zhang presented game-changing performance. Always fight for your dream and never give up!💪💪💪 #Beckham #football #shepower https://t.co/tsqSs4FQmo

legacy.full_text: The #Beijing2022 opening ceremony last night is a great window for the world to understand China better. Not the ancient one, but a modren, diversified, energetic and romantic China with its own way of thinking.

legacy.name: The Olympic Games

legacy.full_text:
The countdown begins at 24... 

Today marks the first of the 24 solar terms of the Chinese lunar calendar, “Beginning of Spring”.

What a way to kick off the 24th edition of the Olympic Winter Games!

#OpeningCeremony | #Beijing2022 https://t.co/FUlTBlIp5E
Wish you a happy Chinese New Year😊😊

legacy.name: Xuejing雪靖

legacy.full_text:
#Beijing2022 Touching moment 3:

The Olympic Hymn was sang by a chorus from a small county in north China's Hebei, where it was just lifted out of poverty in 2020. The red hats and coats with tiger on it symbolize good luck in #theyearoftiger. https://t.co/Mdms4geN4i

legacy.description: Digital editor｜Share #ChinaBuzz | 32 yrs in BJ | Views are mine | RT≠endorsement
legacy.name: Xuejing雪靖

legacy.description: The official Twitter account for the Beijing Organising Committee for the 2022 Olympic and Paralympic Winter Games.
legacy.name: Beijing 2022

legacy.full_text:
Children carry dove lamps, singing and dancing in the arena💓✨
They symbolize the celebration of unity and strength at Beijing2022 and peace around the world.🎊💪

What a magical moment to capture!🥰

#Beijing2022 #Olympics #BingDwenDwen
#TogetherForASharedFuture
📸: GettyImages https://t.co/D7onXczxki

Touching moment 2:

The huge snowflake was formed by single ones representing the participating delegations. Together, for a better future. Simple and clear message. The world needs this.

legacy.description: Digital editor｜Share #ChinaBuzz | 32 yrs in BJ | Views are mine | RT≠endorsement
legacy.name: Xuejing雪靖

legacy.description: The official Twitter account for the Beijing Organising Committee for the 2022 Olympic and Paralympic Winter Games.
legacy.name: Beijing 2022

legacy.full_text:
🎊✨What a fascinating and vibrant performance!

❄️"#立春 Li Chun” - is a symbol of the beginning of spring in East Asian cultures
We wish all the athletes have a great experience at Beijing 2022💪
#Beijing2022 #Olympics #OpeningCeremony
#TogetherForASharedFuture 
📸: GettyImages https://t.co/eJmeI0Q4hS

#Beijing2022 Touching moment 1:

From Li Chun, the dountdown began with the 24 Solar Terms of the Traditional Chinese Calendar and concluded at Li Chun --  beginning of the spring. It shows a cycle, and wisdom of ancient people's attitude towards the nature.
